name: part_002
file: tmp_【＃百鬼あやめ４周年記念 ⧸ 3DLIVE】Nakiriayame 4th anniversary　~Hapiness to you ♡~ [mwJGZ8YU7o4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Nakiri Ayame performs the song 'ODDS & ENDS' during her 4th anniversary 3D live.
Nakiri Ayame performs the song 'Ready Steady Go!' on a vibrant stage.

subtitles.original: ...だって言われるけど
subtitles.english: ...is what they say, but

subtitles.original: きっと君の力になれる
subtitles.english: I'm sure I can be of help to you

subtitles.original: だから私を歌わせてみて
subtitles.english: So please, let me sing

subtitles.original: そう君の
subtitles.english: Yes, with your words

subtitles.original: 君だけの言葉でさ
subtitles.english: With your words alone

subtitles.original: 綴って
subtitles.english: Write them down

subtitles.original: 連ねて
subtitles.english: Line them up

subtitles.original: 私がその言葉を
subtitles.english: Because I will scream

subtitles.original: 叫ぶから
subtitles.english: Those words out loud

subtitles.original: 描いて
subtitles.english: Draw them out

subtitles.original: 理想を
subtitles.english: Your ideals

subtitles.original: その思いは誰にも触れさせない
subtitles.english: Don't let anyone touch those feelings

subtitles.original: ガラクタの声はそして響く
subtitles.english: And so, the voice of junk resonates

subtitles.original: ありのままを不器用につないで
subtitles.english: Clumsily connecting things as they are

subtitles.original: 目一杯に
subtitles.english: To the fullest extent

subtitles.original: 大声をあげる
subtitles.english: I'll raise my voice

subtitles.original: いつからか君は人気者だ
subtitles.english: Before long, you became popular

subtitles.original: たくさんの人に持て囃され 私も鼻が高い
subtitles.english: Praised by so many people, I was proud too

subtitles.original: でもいつからか君は変わった
subtitles.english: But at some point, you changed

subtitles.original: 冷たくなって だけど寂しそうだった
subtitles.english: You grew cold, yet you seemed lonely

subtitles.original: もう機械の声なんてたくさんだ
subtitles.english: “I've had enough of this machine's voice”

subtitles.original: 僕は僕自身なんだよって
subtitles.english: “I am my own person”

subtitles.original: ついに君は抑えきれなくなって
subtitles.english: Finally, you couldn't hold it back anymore

subtitles.original: 私を嫌った
subtitles.english: And you hated me

subtitles.original: 君の後ろで誰かが言う
subtitles.english: Behind your back, someone says

subtitles.original: 虎の威を借る狐のくせに
subtitles.english: “Even though you're just a fox borrowing the tiger's authority”

subtitles.original: ねえ君は
subtitles.english: Hey, you were

subtitles.original: 一人で泣いてたんだね
subtitles.english: Crying all alone, weren't you?

subtitles.original: 聞こえる？この声
subtitles.english: Can you hear it? This voice

subtitles.original: 私がその言葉を
subtitles.english: Because I will drown out

subtitles.original: 掻き消すから
subtitles.english: Those words

subtitles.original: わかってる 本当は
subtitles.english: I know that deep down,

subtitles.original: 君が誰より優しいってことを
subtitles.english: You're kinder than anyone else

subtitles.original: ガラクタの声はそして歌った
subtitles.english: And so, the voice of junk sang

subtitles.original: 他の誰でもない君のために
subtitles.english: For no one other than you

subtitles.original: 軋んでいく 限界を超えて
subtitles.english: Creaking, exceeding the limits

subtitles.original: 二人はどんなにたくさんの言葉を思いついたことだろう
subtitles.english: How many words did we come up with together?

subtitles.original: だけど今は何ひとつ思いつかなくて
subtitles.english: But now, I can't think of even one

subtitles.original: だけど何もかもわかった
subtitles.english: But I understood everything

subtitles.original: そうか、きっとこれは夢だ
subtitles.english: I see, this must be a dream

subtitles.original: 永遠に冷めない
subtitles.english: A dream I'll never wake up from,

subtitles.original: 君と会えた、空飛ぶ夢
subtitles.english: Where I met you, a dream of flying

subtitles.original: ガラクタは幸せそうな顔をしたまま
subtitles.english: The junk, with a happy expression on its face,

subtitles.original: どれだけ呼んでも もう動かない
subtitles.english: Won't move anymore, no matter how much you call

subtitles.original: 望んだはずの結末に 君は泣き叫ぶ
subtitles.english: At the conclusion you should have wanted, you cry out

subtitles.original: 嘘だろ 嘘だろ
subtitles.english: “It's a lie, right? It's a lie...”

subtitles.original: そう泣き叫ぶ
subtitles.english: So you cry out

subtitles.original: 僕は無力だ
subtitles.english: I am powerless

subtitles.original: ガラクタひとつだって救いやしない
subtitles.english: I can't even save a single piece of junk

subtitles.original: 想いは涙に ぽつりぽつりとその頬濡らす
subtitles.english: My feelings turn to tears, wetting your cheeks drop by drop

subtitles.original: その時世界は 途端にその色を大きく変える
subtitles.english: In that moment, the world suddenly changes its colors significantly

subtitles.original: 悲しみ 喜び 全てを独り占め 一つにした
subtitles.english: Sadness, joy, keeping it all to myself, making it one

subtitles.original: 言葉は歌になりこの世界を 再び駆け巡る君のために
subtitles.english: Words become a song, traveling the world once more for you

subtitles.original: その声に 意思を宿して
subtitles.english: Infusing that voice with a will

subtitles.original: 今 想いが響く
subtitles.english: Now, my feelings resonate

subtitles.original: 繊細な君の心を かき乱して しまうもの
subtitles.english: The things that stir up your delicate heart

subtitles.original: 吹き飛ばしたいけど まだ 言葉を並べて あれこれ
subtitles.english: I want to blow them away, but I'm still lining up words about this and that

subtitles.original: 言えるほど 大人じゃなくて
subtitles.english: I'm not grown-up enough to say them

subtitles.original: 黙ってしまうだけなの
subtitles.english: So I just end up staying silent

subtitles.original: Be alright 風は明日へと吹いてる
subtitles.english: Be alright, the wind is blowing towards tomorrow

subtitles.original: Be alright 君の真っ白なシャツを ほら 翼みたいに はためかせてる
subtitles.english: Be alright, look, your pure white shirt is fluttering like wings

subtitles.original: いくよ
subtitles.english: Here we go!

subtitles.original: READY STEADY GO!
subtitles.english: READY STEADY GO!
